title: Dev Blog: Visual Effects in League of Legends

replies.body: {{champion:14}} You can't hide behind lackeys.
Imagine a shrek skin for {{champion:14}}.
Lol, his ult would play All Star! Then make it become louder the closer he gets to you! Amazing!
Smashed Mouth Sion
OMG please make this happen.  I want this as badly as I want flying spaghetti monster Vel'Koz

Sion is love, Sion is Life.

Its never ogre.
if he had a voice line "get out of mah swamp" when he warmed up q
shouldnt farquaad be {{champion:45}} ?
{{champion:80}} My profession?! You know, now that I think of it, I've always wanted to be a baker.
{{champion:120}} I see donkey Hecarim in the near future....

Ogrelord Sion
that would have a run in with the copywright... maybe the green giant and have him hold a giant broccoli
Another amazing Dev Blog, showing us more about why you do this or explaining why its important. Keep up the good work!
#truth

Logged in to my old NA account just to ask for because I think it is deserved, I have long craved an {{champion:34}} VFX update, I mean, I main Anivia, I play her Blackfrost always and that skin is plain beautiful, but when looking at any other Anivia skin, VFX screams "here since beta" or something, polygons on VFX suck, I think her Q would look better by just changing the model for an old minion with a wooden face :p I love the new splash art that is on the PBE and I'd love to see an Anivia Visual update that matches with it C: please comment, I put my faith in that you shall be seen and maybe if God smiles at us we will get a short response :'v

I love bird too :) I play her support. I would also love to see her get a VFX update, even just to make her wall texture a little nicer. She did get a minor Q VFX update, and though I won't say it's the best, it does accurately represent gameplay. Hopefully if people like these vfx updates we can get the support to do more of them.

Another anivia main here, About her wall, can you make that actually impassable as the description says or is it always going to be able to be dashed through? That invisble Q bug too. been around for years. Still hasn't been fixed lol.
Best part is your name is Pheonix.
Riot. Can you fix Darius's ULT VFX? It just seems like he is cutting a mountain in half...
he is, if you're {{champion:54}}
Meanwhile {{champion:44}}  still shoots oversized sparkles and has a brown piece of spaghetti hanging off the back of his head.
I think Taric needs more than a minor VFX update :)
> gg minions fed sion

ive seent he new brand animations and honestly i dont think they are all that good. they are very.... well.... comic book like, kinda like something you'd see on a videogame from the gamecube. I just feel like the animations couldve been better designed but for the most part the other animations are good.
The animations were not updated, only the visual effects.

Funny you should mention Xerath, I'm kind of dissatisfied about his particles. His abilities are great but I don't like how smooth and non-lightining-like they look. Xerath is all about vast amounts of uncontrolled, unshaped energy spewing forth. These visuals are too discrete, too precise, which is why I think they'd look much better as lightning. For example, instead of a...raindrop...his ult should cause an arc to jump between him and the impact point, with a really sweet electric "ZAP", and an echo of magical thunder. 

Just thoughts though. Ideas are cheap.
Well, I prefer him having plasma to lightning since it looked too much like Ryze's effects (at the time).

If his QWE are plasma (I prefer to think it's pure mana), then his ult is a damned water balloon.

Though I think a lot of that is SFX, really.  I'd still like for it to be  an orbital strike laser sort of thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Zenthon127,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=B4Q7j8nM,comment-id=001700000000,timestamp=2015-06-23T00:20:24.812+0000)

Is it just me, or do a lot of people I meant want to give Xerath an orbital strike for his ult? I want it, I have a colleague who wants it, you want it...
That's gotta be attack on {{champion:14}} there for the minions. Now all we need is for a minion to turn into a champion and were good
Well, I used to confuse Veigar for a minion...
{{champion:45}} Know that if the tables were turned, I would show you no mercy!
imagine a buzz light year {{champion:111}}
{{champion:78}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:19}}  need major work.
{{champion:21}}  is finally being talked about?
well, she's just so bad, no one really cared to talk about her before.
_**NICE OPINION M8.**_
MF isn't bad she's the one adc I'd rip my hair out for if I were against her
I LOVE {{champion:21}} She is probably the only adc i play with.

Also, I think you guys need to work on your particle engine. Have it so you can change particle colors without needing a completely new asset. I remember talking to a Rioter about how they couldn't just "change Ahri's nuke color without creating an entirely new particle just for it." No clue if that has changed, but it seemed like a huge limitation.

It WOULD be great believe me :) In order to get the color depth of most textures it's necessary to create a new asset. However you can have a texture that is white with a detailed alpha, and keyframe the colors. We do that for sparks and flashes.
Why Can't we spawn a ton of minions? #satisfactionOP
I'd love to see Malzahar get one of these updates I think he really deserves it.

Malzahar is a pain. The dot is too intense! TOO INTENSE!

Maybe they would be if they didn't scale with AP and do Physical damage... Get it together

I see the images clearly. I do love the VFX on Star Guardian and Master Alchemist Ziggs. I wanted the Pool Party Ziggs to match Graves...but when I saw MA Ziggs. I loved it instantly.  Im looking forward to the new improved skins.
